titleInfo.title: Morris and Zelda Averch Family Passover Seder

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Typed caption in photo book: ''Zelda and Morris Averch Family Passover Seder, Denver, Colorado, 1932; L to R: Samuel Kaminsky, Estelle Kaminsky Levitt, Anna Averch Kaminsky, Eleanor Kaminsky Nasbarg, Zelda and Morris Averch, Stanley Averch, Dave and Verner Averch, Evelyn Averch, Eva Averch, Meyer and Estelle Averch Stine.; Courtesy: Estelle Levitt.''

mods.abstract: The Morris and Zelda Averch family celebrate the Passover Seder with their children and grandchildren, including members of the Kaminsky family. From left to right, Samuel Kaminsky, Estelle Kaminsky (Levitt), Anna Averch Kaminsky, Eleanor Kaminsky (Nasbarg), Zelda and Morris Averch, Stanley Averch, Dave and Verner Averch, Evelyn Averch, Eva Averch, Meyer Averch and Estelle Averch (Stine). This is a copy of the original photograph.
mods.note: Donated by Estelle Kaminsky Levitt for publication in A Colorado Jewish Family Album.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
